node.title: Kiwi UFC star Hooker returns to featherweight division for London fight
node.description: The 31-year-oldâ€™s keen to chase big-name fights in the lower weight class.
node.content:
["Kiwi fighter Dan Hooker will return to the Octagon - and the featherweight division - to take on Englishman Arnold Allen at UFC London in March. ", "After climbing the lightweight rankings in recent years, earning blockbuster bouts against Dustin Poirier and Michael Chandler, Hooker has suffered three defeats in his past four fights to slip down the rankings to eighth. 
", "He joins Aussie teammate and current world champion Alexander Volkanovski at featherweight. ", "Looking for a new challenge, Hooker will have to drop weight to take on the seventh-ranked Allen, who is undefeated in eight UFC fights. 
", "The City Kickboxing captain recently underwent a test weight cut, tipping the scales at 146 pounds (66.2kg) to qualify for featherweight. 
", ""I spent a long portion at that weight class [featherweight], so I can't really understand why it's so unfathomable for everyone to think that I can make the weight," Hooker told The AllStar YouTube channel. 
", ""I just did it to prove that it was very easy. You get me a fight and fly me across the world, then of course I’m going to step on the scales at that weight. 
", ""I did it for absolutely no reason, I did it to prove a point to my coaches, I guess."", "Hooker's under no illusions that his change in class won’t be easy, but he’s determined to inflict a first UFC defeat on his opponent. 
", ""I can see why I get the fight, because I generally get the fights that other people don’t want to take," he says. ", ""It excites me to get out there and get the opportunity to stop a run like that. To stop it and to take all of that momentum that he’s carrying from those eight wins, for myself, that’s what excites me about this fight."
", "The move is also a calculated one from Hooker, with a desire to chase big-name opponents a major factor, instead of "treading water" at lightweight. 
", ""I’m not looking past Arnold or anything like that, but that gets you one of the huge-name guys in the division. That’s really my main motivation for going down to featherweight… to put myself back in the mix.
", ""The reality of the situation is I’ve lost to three of the top five guys in the lightweight division. It doesn’t really excite me treading water at [155lb] for the next year. 
", ""I don’t fight for the money or attention, I fight purely to entertain myself. This move just excites me to get back there and get straight in the mix."", "The Hooker-Allen bout is scheduled for March 20 (NZ time) at O2 Arena."]
